title.rendered: Top Power BI Development Companies to Grow Your Business In the Modern Era

content.rendered:
Microsoft power bi (business intelligence) helps organizations in analyzing data and also share insights. Using power bi service, small and big enterprises can monitor their business operations closely and receive quick answers via rich dashboards. This technology keeps updating itself every month with amazing features and functions.

As per MarketsandMarkets report, the global BI market size to grow from USD 23.1 billion in 2020 to USD 33.3 billion by the year 2025 @CAGR of 7.6% according to the forecast period. 


Img src: marketsandmarkets 

Rising demand for data visualization, digital transformation success, increase in cloud adoption, and rising investment in analytics has led many companies to make a shift to this technology. But, due to the presence of a number of power bi consulting companies, it would be hard to decide on one.

To ease this, I have researched on top 25 power bi consultants and checked on major pointers personally. 

Here I have listed the top 25 power bi consultants(having 100% global recognition) on the basis of some important parameters’ viz. Expertise level, hourly price, client feedback, the latest technologies used, workfolio, etc. 

Find the list below:

1) PixelCrayons

  • Official Location: India, United States
  • Cost per hour: $12-30/hr
  • Employees Count: 250 – 999
  • Founded In: 2008

PixelCrayons is a well-established company that has been providing services worldwide for over 16 years. They have 500+ skilled consultants who specialize in various technologies to help your business succeed with cutting-edge solutions, including Power BI techs!

The corporation’s dedicated Microsoft Power BI consultants help companies analyze their data and make the right decisions.

Notable Clients: Next, hp, Vodafone, USC, Puma, Qatar Airways, eBay

Core Service Area: Software Development Services, Mobile App Development, Blockchain Development, eCommerce Development, IoT Development, DevOps Solutions, Machine Learning Services Solutions, Power BI consulting services, Chatbot Development Services, iOS/Android App Development, etc.

2) invertio 

  • Official Location: India
  • Cost per hour:  $25/hr
  • Employees Count: 250 – 999
  • Founded In: 2004

invertio has been providing power bi services around the world that combine business domain knowledge, proven methodologies, and the latest technologies with over 450 well-trained software professionals, including power bi consultants to deliver high-quality solutions that add value to your business. They are serving everyone for their various technological requirements since 2004.

They have a team of dedicated Microsoft Power BI consultants who help startups, SMEs, and enterprises analyze business data and gain useful insights. Therefore, you can hire bi developers from here who aim to harness their potential to address organizational challenges for large-scale data storage and seamless processing.

Notable Clients: Track Opinion, ZenQ, Novea, FlexiLoans, Capgemini, Selectspecs, Estel,  Dubai Police, Risk Logic, Reaqua, Affle

Core Service Area: IT strategy and consulting, Dedicated Software /Web/ Mobile/ App Teams, power bi consulting services, Online Appointment Booking Software Solutions, Food Delivery App Development, Fintech Software Solutions, QA/ Testing Services, Web/App Design, Blockchain, Android, iOS

Not Sure Where to Start with Power BI?

Begin your Power BI journey with a tailored strategy session for your business.

Contact Us

3) Ammaiya 

  • Official Location: India
  • Cost per hour: $25/hr
  • Employees Count: 10 – 49
  • Founded In: 2014

Ammaiya is a leading power bi consulting company located in India. Since 2014, they have created compliment-worthy custom sites using Microsoft power bi service that are highly sophisticated and the best digital creativity for businesses of various natures. Their extremely passionate, motivated, eager, and confident power bi team is always ready to embrace the challenge of the IT industry with a positive attitude. 

They incorporate the latest BI technologies to help your business consistently reveal the most powerful insights in real-time. Its Power BI solutions transform information into rich visuals that allow businesses to make crucial choices without question.

Notable Clients: Pinch of Spice, Gulf Vision, RTI Guru, Rama Steels, Global Capital Market, Sagar Fish Aquarium

Core Service Area: Software Development, Website Design, Website Development, Power bi consulting services, Digital Marketing, Graphic Designing, Data Entry.

4) Technoduce Info Solutions

Official Location: India

Cost per hour:  $25/hr

Employees Count: 50 – 249

Founded In: 2011

Technoduce Info Solutions Pvt Ltd. is a leading bi consulting company. They are a team of over 45 who are Power Bi consultants dedicated to serving clients and have been operating in the IT industry since 2011. They are bringing the latest BI technologies to help your business in real-time. Furthermore, they have highly trained professionals who design interactive display solutions and a robust dashboard to drive business ROI. 

You can explore with BI to analyze and view data with interactive reports. Its Power BI service helps you gain real-time business visibility. They are also involved in a massive effort to invent and develop multiple web and mobile applications that are suitable for all industry verticals.

Notable Clients:  FoodCyclon, Fopark, Laundry cloud, QiQ, Kushin, Giantware, JLL, Mezzan holdings co, Juuan, Miugodo, Advanta Africa, FoodFex, Caterninja, FoodPine, Pick App, Fitnessmeals, Deliveryman, Alo order

Core Service Area: Digital marketing, Web development, Mobile app development, Software development, Power bi consulting services

5) ARKA Softwares

Official Location: United States, India

Cost per hour:  $25/hr

Employees Count: 50 – 249

Founded In: 2010

Arka Softwares is an industry-leading ISO 9001: 2015 certified power bi consulting company with over 100 passionate developers and designers, based in Jaipur, India, with offices in the US, UK, and Australia. They have been helping their consumer-facing clients drive the business forward with their contemporary, innovation-driven software solutions since their establishment in 2010.

They have incorporated not only conventional research but also their own research to invent exceptional mobile apps and web apps that work for you and automate your entire business while making it accessible anytime, anywhere. Your fan-driven power bi consultants leave no stone unturned to bring you trending apps and support services that go beyond the client’s expectations.

Notable Clients: All N1 Fashionista, ReadUp, IPC Kuwait, Fahemni, Jeeto11

Core Service Area: Mobile Application Development, Power bi consulting services, E-Commerce Development, Microsoft Development, PHP Development

Boost Your Business with Power BI

Grow your business by transforming your data into actionable insights and stunning visuals.

Contact Us

6) Saviant Intelligent Solutions

Official Location: India, United States

Cost per hour: NA

Employees Count: 50 – 249

Founded In: 2014

Saviant is the industrial automation partner for companies that require many assets and a large workforce. Joined in 2014 and successfully completed more than 7 years in the industry. His team of Power BI consultants creates entirely new solutions for these types of businesses to enable smart actions and accelerated business results. 

Their team of Power BI developers creates robust and structured BI environments for organizations like yours. With extensive experience in structured data modeling, SQL coding, data warehouse design, and implementation, we quickly establish a business intelligence environment so you can use your data efficiently.

Notable Clients: Shea Homes, Omega, BuilderMT, Tri Cascade, Leidos, MiTek, Energetics

Core Service Area: IT Strategy Consulting, BI & Big Data Consulting, Cloud Consulting, Power bi services, IT Infrastructure Consulting, Digital Transformation Consulting, DevOps consulting, IT Strategy Consulting

7) Binary Republik

Official Location: United States, India

Cost per hour: $25 – $49/hr

Employees Count: 50 – 249

Founded In: 2009

Their SharePoint consultants strictly follow Microsoft and industry best practices, ensuring the highest quality of delivery and coding standards. They put all stakeholders at the same table to ensure that each of them is clear about the objectives and therefore is focused on the same direction to obtain the desired result. 

Their team of expert power bi developers is experienced in handling complex raw data and turning it into a meaningful analytical dashboard. They have handled a diverse set of data sources within Power BI, such as SQL Server, analytics service with tabular and multidimensional models, etc. Our Power BI experts, in addition to following Microsoft best practices, also ensure that they are constantly updated with the latest version of it. Evolving product, thus utilizing the latest features and making the most of available tools.

Notable Clients: ZS Pharma, USAmeri Bank, South Jersey Healthcare, Blythedale Children Hospital, Microsoft, Pegasystems, GlobalSummit, Florence & Hutcheson, Benjamin Moore & Co.

Core Service Area:  SharePoint consulting, Power bi consulting services, Health Checks, Social Collaboration, UX & Branding, Public Facing Sites, Intranet/ Extranet Portals, Enterprise Search, 3rd Party product Integration, Strategic Consulting, global implementations, SharePoint Maintenance & Support

Also read: 8 Data-Driven Benefits of Microsoft Power BI tool, which makes it A Blockbuster

8) Imenso Software

Official Location: India

Cost per hour: $25 – $49/hr

Employees Count: 50 – 249

Founded In: 2009

Imenso Software is a leading power bi consulting company, focusing its strength on the right combination of business solutions, custom software development, web and mobile application development, CMS, e-commerce solutions, and much more to meet the needs of small and large. Business. Its mission is to deliver high-quality IT services that evolve with corresponding technology and business trends. 

Their in-house Power BI experts have provided business intelligence solutions for data processing, storage, and analysis. They provide powerful Power BI solutions to industry leaders and large companies in different domains to extract valuable information from their data.

Notable Clients: MBj Jewellers, OCTB Global, Impactify, SocialTech Services

Core Service Area: Power bi consulting services, Game development, UI/UX design, Hybrid mobile apps’ development, Power bi development 

9) Phocas Software

Official Location: United Kingdom, United States

Cost per hour: $50 – $99/hr

Employees Count: 50 – 249

Founded In: 1999

Phocas Software is a leading power bi consulting firm created by Myles Glashier and Paul Magee in 1999. It is a private, self-funded team of passionate professionals who are committed to helping people feel good about their data. Today, they have grown to serve more than 1,700 companies and approximately 20,000 people who rely on software to complement ERP functionality and manage business operations. 

They mainly serve midsize and business clients who appreciate their customized, industry-focused solutions that simplify data management through powerful analysis and visualization tools and revolutionize the way they interact with their own information.

Notable Clients: Trutex, Jet Couriers, Inolex, Sterimedix, Yamaha, VGM international, Bosch, Aston Barclay, Alcoa, Britpart, Patterson Medical, Fairmont Medical, Provet, Philips, Pfizer

Core Service Area: Pronto, Microsoft Dynamics, and Sage, Power bi services, Data analytics, Infor, Epicor, Pronto, Microsoft Dynamics

Challenged by Complex Data?

Simplify complex data analysis with our customized Power BI solutions for businesses.

Book Free Consultation

10) Datapine

Official Location: Germany

Cost per hour: $50 – $99/hr

Employees Count: 10 – 49

Founded In: 2012

Datapine is a young and innovative company located in the heart of Berlin. They are developing a highly scalable SaaS tool that will revolutionize the way of performing database analysis by making even complex functionality available to non-technical people. With their product, they aspire to become innovation leaders in the business intelligence market for small and medium-sized enterprises. 

Plus, their power bi developers will help you further your analysis and gain a better insight into your data. Together with you, they will create professional dashboards that visualize your data, specifically responding to your individual business needs.

Notable Clients: R+V Versicherung , Axel Springer, Kreditech , The University of Texas, Osram

Core Service Area: Business Analytics, Data Analysis, and Dashboards & Reports, Power bi consulting services, Data Visualization

11)  QBurst

QBurst is a world-class development, and consulting company focused on new-generation technology platforms and catering excellent Power BI services. The Q Burst team has 1300+ employees from around the globe, including developers, designers, UX engineers, quality assurance specialists, business analysts, project managers, and other professionals.

Being one of the top power BI development companies, it facilitates a variety of assistance such as mobile application & web solutions as well big data analytics user experience design, testing, cloud-based system setups for your organization.

Official Location: India

Cost per hour: $25/hr

Employees Count: 1000– 9999

Founded In: 2004

Notable Clients: United Nations, NYU, Network Solutions, Allianz, National Geographic, Adani, Webs.com, PrivateFly, Network 18, Dell, Airtel, Petrofac, Rosetta Stone, Omron, Bozzuto

Core Service Area: Dedicated Teams, Staff Augmentation, Software Outsourcing, Staffing Hero.

Also read: How Power BI and OLAP Cubes Improve Your Business

12) INT

INT. is a digital-first, award-winning enterprise that has specialized in bringing innovative ideas to life since 1997. It offers simple and sustainable solutions with the confluence of technology, analytics, marketing for clients across 20+ countries. Its headquarters are in New York City, USA.

Being a top Power BI development company, it offers incredible services exclusively to agencies no matter what size they are. It doesn’t just stop after one project has finished; Instead, every engagement breeds new opportunities, which can help boost an organization’s growth exponentially over time through better understanding their customers’ needs while also revealing competitive advantages.

Official Location: Canada

Cost per hour: $25-$49/hr

Employees Count: 250–999

Founded In: 1997

13). Future Processing

Future Processing is a software engineering company that has been providing world-class services to clients for over 20 years. If you are interested in digital transformation and looking for Power BI consultants for your business, then they can walk through this process together step by step until completion, which will lead to the next level of success!

The Intellias team has been featured in many notable publications, such as being recognized on Inc 5000 (#1 employer), winning GSA UK Awards, Silver Stevie Award winner, 17th Annual International Business Awards. N-iX, the Eastern European provider of software development services with over 1700 full-time experts that power organizations globally, offers a comprehensive range of products and services, including web design & programming or data analytics in an array of languages like C#/VB, NET, MYSQL, Oracle, SQL, PL/Perl, etc., which makes them one of Europe’s fastest-growing companies according to Inc Magazine’s list for 2017.

16) Itransition

Itransition is one of the trusted Power BI development companies with more than 20 years of professional experience. The team at Itransition delivers services to clients located in over 30 countries around the world, 3000+ diverse IT professionals, and mature methodologies that provide effective handling for any size or complexity of the project.

The company is recognized for its incompetent position in the market that has been built due to innovative approach at core and rising customer satisfaction rate.

Official Location: Colorado

Cost per hour: $25-$49/hr

Employees Count: 1000–9999

Founded In: 1998

Notable Clients: Expedia, eBay, PayPal, BP, Statoil, KPMG, Acronis, IBM, Citibank, Telekom Austria Group, Adidas, Shell, Kaspersky Lab, Xerox, Toyota, United Nations

Hire Us for Results!

Accelerate your business growth by choosing our Power BI solutions tailored to your needs.

Schedule a Call

17) Netguru

Netguru is a renowned power BI development company that builds products to help people do things differently. Its clients have changed the way it works, listens, and learns languages; they also helped make renting bikes easier than ever before.

Netguru’s team has even been featured in major media outlets like TechCrunch or Business Insider because their innovative solutions stand out from others on this market competitively priced but high-quality service too. 18) Experion Technologies

Experion technologies’ core strength is in software product engineering services. It is engaged in harnessing digital technologies to develop customized solutions for our customers, ranging from Fortune 1000 companies and startups.

Its experience spans across FinTech or Insurtech industries as well; they have worked with numerous organizations that are building cutting edge products and frameworks like Insuranet (a data analytics platform), insurance lending marketplace app, healthy minds medical insurance rating system).

Its diverse skill set allows it to offer clients tailored business consulting on any of these areas by leveraging what they need most — which could be anything: an optimized website layout & user interface design process; guidance around strategy development considerations.

Notable Clients: Duracell, Speedo, Tyson Foods, Ford, TopGolf, ASK Chemicals, Merck Group, Bacardi, Qatar Airways, City Group, Aegon, Shell, J &J, Melbourne Health, Aditya Birla Group, CoStar Group, Aecom.

Door3 is a software consultancy that specializes in delivering solutions on time and budget and best-in-class Power BI consulting. Founded by peers having 15+ years of experience, Door 3 offers clients an unparalleled capacity to develop safe, reliable code for the modern workplace while offering insight-driven strategy from their award-winning design practices.

Morgan Stanley benefited greatly after partnering up with this company because they have developed many successful projects, which helped make them one of the best financial firms out there today!

Founded In: 2002

At Sphere Partners, the experts provide cutting-edge solutions for the most pressing business challenges in today’s dynamic digital world. Its team of experts has years of experience developing and executing inspired plans that drive real results irrespective of the services you need.

From Monday morning brainstorms to enterprise platform integrations, from project management consulting to software development — Its Power BI consultants & experts have done it all across many industries at every level.

Cost per hour: $150-$200/hr

Employees Count: 50– 250

Founded In: 2005

Notable Clients: Buzzfeed, Tumblr, Land’s End, Sears, Nokia, Subway, Gett, BluVector, Bass Pro Shops, ING Bank, Delta Dental, Beachbody, Morningstar, Groupon, Berlingske Media

Employees Count: 250– 999

A team of trained professionals with 10+ years of experience in transforming businesses by developing innovative solutions has done just this. It is helping startups be at their creative best while also making it easier than ever before to launch new products online (and offline!)

Cost per hour: $100-$149/hr

Employees Count: 50–250

Founded In: 2009

Notable Clients: Callanetics, Hiscox, Jaguar Landrover, Trainline, Warburtons, BBC, Uber, CPP, NHS, DEFRA, Leeds University

Iflexion is a web development company with more than 20 years of business experience. It has provided professional digital solutions and Power BI solutions for any complexity, from small businesses to Fortune 500 companies-and counting! Cost per hour: $25-$49/hr

Employees Count: 1000–9999

Founded In: 1998

24) IT Svit

IT Svit is one of the top power BI development companies with a deep understanding of infrastructure design and Cloud computing. Its DevOps team has successfully completed thousands of projects working with AWS, Google Cloud Platform, bare-metal infrastructures as well;

It strives to make life easier by implementing: CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins & Gitlab), Containers & Orchestration Kubernetes). The teams at IT Svit are experts in security measures for your organization’s data through optimized VPNs or Bastion hosts if you need them.

Employees Count: 50–250

Prismetric is a world-class Mobile App Development & power Bi development company that offers exceptional application development for iPhone, iPad, Android devices, wearables, and other devices. We have an unmatched strength of over 80+ skilled designers & developers with the sole mindset to provide customer satisfaction!

Prismetrics is ISO 9001:2015 certified mobile app company having offices in India, USA, Hong Kong, Brazil, Qatar, offering end-to-end solutions alongside other web services such as design/development, etc., at affordable rates.

Cost per hour: $25/hour

Employees Count: 50–250

Founded In: 2008

Notable Clients: Today Publications, Coca-Cola, Singapore Post, Discover The World, Peugeot, Chase Bank,

Core Service Area: Mobile app development, Web development, Software development, Internet Of Things, SAP services, Blockchain development, Big Data services, eCommerce development, Testing & QA services, and more.

Supercharge Your Business with Top Power BI Experts

Unlock data-driven success with the best in the industry!

Contact Us

Final Note:

Microsoft Power BI can boost both tangible & intangible revenue of an organization by catering priceless information & insight related to customers/users. Businesses that want to uplift their position in the market and beat the competition must infuse Power BI and data analytics. It’s easily possible by acquiring top-notch assistance from power BI consultants or power BI development company.

So far, we have listed top power bi consulting companies that would surely help generate good revenue for all your businesses. In fact, I did great brainstorming and deep research to curate this list, so you can completely rely on it.

Furthermore, the companies listed above have already helped a lot of clients globally and received positive feedback for both power bi development services and power bi consulting. But I must suggest you choose anyone Microsoft Power BI or Microsoft Power Automate consultants, as per your business requirements.

If you are looking for cost-effective business solutions, then you can go with three companies named invertio, Phocas software, and Saviant Intelligent Solutions. They have a good Portfolio to date and work best as per the industry research.
